description: A GWT-based Java class defining the ToDoView component for a TodoMVC application, handling UI interactions, routing, and data display.

classes.name: ToDoView
classes.description: A GWT Composite widget implementing the ToDo list view, managing UI elements, event handling, and routing.

methods.name: ToDoView
methods.description: Constructor initializing UI components and setting element IDs.

methods.name: getTaskText
methods.description: Returns the current text in the task input field.

methods.name: addhandler
methods.description: Binds UI events to the provided ViewEventHandler.

methods.name: setDataProvider
methods.description: Connects a data provider to the todo table display.

methods.name: setTaskStatistics
methods.description: Updates UI with total and completed task counts.

methods.name: setRouting
methods.description: Updates routing hyperlink styles based on current route.
